title: Understanding the Insert Command
text: To insert single cells or a range of cells, you need to use a specific command. This command is often found in the shortcut menu when you right-click on the selected cells.

title: Exploring the Shortcut Menu
text: The shortcut menu provides various options for cell manipulation, including inserting, deleting, and formatting cells. Look for the option that allows you to insert cells.

hintAnswer: use the insert command on the shortcut menu
title: Using the Insert Command
text: What command should you use from the shortcut menu to insert single cells or a range of cells?
choices: use the insert command on the shortcut menu
do not insert single or ranges of cells
